inputs.sentence: Andrew finally returned the French book to Chris that I bought last week

outputs.sentence: Andrew sonunda returned the French kitap to Chris bunu I bought son hafta

inputs.sentence: Sentences with gapping, such as Paul likes coffee and Mary tea, lack an overt predicate to indicate the relation between two or more arguments.

outputs.sentence: Sentences ile gapping, such as Paul beğenme kahve ve Mary tea, eksiklik an overt predicate to indicate the akraba arasındaki iki or devamı arguments.

inputs.sentence: Alice in Wonderland is a 2010 American live-action/animated dark fantasy adventure film

outputs.sentence: Alice in Wonderland is a 2010 American live-action/animated karanlık fantezi macera film

inputs.sentence: Ujjal Dev Dosanjh served as 33rd Premier of British Columbia from 2000 to 2001

outputs.sentence: Ujjal Dev Dosanjh served as 33rd Premier of British Columbia from 2000 to 2001

inputs.sentence: Neuroplasticity is a continuous processing allowing short-term, medium-term, and long-term remodeling of the neuronosynaptic organization.

outputs.sentence: Neuroplasticity is a sürekli işleme allowing short-term, medium-term, ve long-term tadilat of the neuronosynaptic organization.
